name: Tests Buff 1
desc1: Increase your Girls' HP by 5%, Attack by 5%, Crit by 1%, and Crit Damage by 2.5% in Tests (Old Campus Exploration included) battles for 3 battles.

name: Tests Buff 2
desc1: Increase your Girls' Damage Depletion by 2.5%, all Damage dealt by 2.5% in Tests (Old Campus Exploration included) battles for 3 battles.
